import axios from'axios';import Cookies from'js-cookie';const axiosInstance=axios.create({baseURL:'http://localhost:8000/',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Accept':'application/json'}});axiosInstance.interceptors.request.use(async config=>{const token=Cookies.get('csrftoken');if(!token){await axiosInstance.get('/api/get_csrf/');// Assuming you have an endpoint to refresh CSRF token
}config.headers['X-CSRFToken']=Cookies.get('csrftoken');return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});export default axiosInstance;
